subSubSection.paragraph:
K001118586, M0030354, M0030355, NY00259547, P 03750749, P 03750751, PH 00023430). Fig. 2 . =
Senecio alatus var. nudicaulis Kuntze (1891: 362)
,
syn. nov.
Type:— INDIA . Sikkim , 2000 m , collection date unknown, O. Kuntze 6946 ( holotype : NY00259549). Fig. 1A . =
Sen. alatus var. elatus Kuntze (1891: 362)
,
syn. nov.
Type:— INDIA . Sikkim , 2300 m , collection date unknown, O. Kuntze 6697 ( holotype : NY00259548). Fig. 1B .
For a full list of synonyms and descriptions see Jeffrey & Chen (1984) .

Distribution: —
Synotis alata
is widely distributed in Bhutan , Nepal , northern India , northeastern Myanmar , and southwestern China . It grows in forests or thickets at elevations between 1600–4200 m above sea level.
Phenology: —Flowering August to November; fruting November to December.

Additional specimens examined:— BHUTAN . Thimphu
